dc.title: TRMM
dc.description: Welcome to NASA's Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission where you can see global precipitation and flood alerts as they happen. TRMM is a joint mission between NASA and the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) desig release of energy that helps to power the global atmospheric circulation shaping both weather and climate around the globe.
